description: '''Michael Edward Mills''' (born December 17, 1958) is an American [[multi-instrumentalist]], singer, and [[composer]] who was a founding member of the [[alternative rock]] band [[R.E.M.]] Though known primarily as the bass guitarist and backing vocalist of R.E.M., his musical repertoire also includes keyboards and occasional lead vocals. He contributed to a majority of the band's musical compositions and is the only member to have had formal musical training.
